entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening then partly cloudy. Snow level 900 metres lowering to near valley bottom this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Snow level 1000 metres. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to near valley bottom in the evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 25 March 2023
